summary:
I am independent, critical, result oriented researcher/engineer with strong analytical problem solving skill. I am flexible and quickly adaptive to new environment. I am a fast learner and always eager to learn new thing. Dutch-Vietnamese citizenship
My scientific interest includes: (1) catalysis, (2) chemical engineering, (3) sustainable technology, (4) analytical chemistry, (5) bio-chemistry
